revision.text:
{{Infobox company |name = Inktank Storage Inc. |type = [[Private Company]] |foundation = 2011 |Headquarters = 707 Wilshire Blvd
Los Angeles, CA  90017 |key_people = Sage Weil - Founder & CTO
Bryan Bogensberger - CEO |industry = [[Computer data storage|Computer Storage]] |homepage = [http://www.inktank.com/ http://www.inktank.com] }} Inktank is the lead development contributor and financial sponsor company behind the open source [[Ceph (file system)|Ceph]] distributed file system.{{cite web|title=Startup Inktank Supports Ceph Open-Source Storage Technology|url=http://www.crn.com/news/storage/232901497/startup-inktank-supports-ceph-open-source-storage-technology.htm|accessdate=5 February 2013}} Inktank was founded by Sage Weil and initially funded by [[DreamHost]] {{cite web|title=DreamHost spins off Inktank, provides professional services for Ceph cloud storage|url=https://451research.com/report-short?entityId=72305|accessdate=5 February 2013}} and [[Mark Shuttleworth]].{{cite web|title=Open source champ Mark Shuttleworth invests $1M in Ceph storage startup|url=http://gigaom.com/2012/09/11/open-source-champ-mark-shuttleworth-invests-1m-ceph-storage-startup/|accessdate=5 February 2013}} == History == Inktank was created to offer professional services and support for the open source Ceph storage system. CTO and founder Sage Weil started the open source Ceph project in 2004 for his [[Thesis|doctoral dissertation]] at the [[University of California, Santa Cruz]].{{cite web |date=2007-12-01 |author = Sage Weil |title=Ceph: Reliable, Scalable, and High-Performance Distributed Storage |url=http://ceph.com/papers/weil-thesis.pdf |publisher=[[University of California, Santa Cruz]] }} In August 2012, Inktank joined the [[Linux Foundation]] to further open source technologies such as Ceph.{{cite web|title=Inktank Joins Linux Foundation, Collaborates on Open Source Storage|url=http://finance.yahoo.com/news/inktank-joins-linux-foundation-collaborates-123000033.html|accessdate=5 February 2013}} In September 2012, Mark Shuttleworth invested 1 Million dollars to help support the progression of Ceph. == Post Launch Industry Impact == *In July 2012, Inktank was listed in the Infostor 6 Storage Startups to Watch{{cite web|title=6 Storage Startups to Watch|url=http://www.infostor.com/storage-management/6-storage-startups-to-watch.html|accessdate=5 February 2013}} *In July 2012, Inktank was listed in CRN The 10 Coolest Storage Startups Of 2012{{cite web|title=The 10 Coolest Storage Startups Of 2012|url=http://www.crn.com/slide-shows/storage/240003163/the-10-coolest-storage-startups-of-2012-so-far.htm?pgno=5|accessdate=5 February 2013}} *In May 2012, Inktank was listed in CRN 10 Hot Emerging Vendors For May 2012{{cite web|title=10 Hot Emerging Vendors For May 2012|url=http://www.crn.com/slide-shows/cloud/240000670/10-hot-emerging-vendors-for-may-2012.htm?pgno=6|accessdate=5 February 2013}} == Partners == *[[Dell]] {{cite web|title=Dell and Inktank Partner on the Cloud and Big Data|url=http://www.dabcc.com/article.aspx?id=23140|accessdate=5 February 2013}} *[[Canonical Ltd.|Canonical]] {{cite web|title=Inktank Partners With Canonical|url=http://finance.yahoo.com/news/inktank-partners-canonical-122900432.html|accessdate=5 February 2013}} *[[SUSE]] {{cite web|title=Inktank and SUSE Partner to Support SUSE Cloud|url=http://www.linux-magazine.com/Online/News/Inktank-and-SUSE-Partner-to-Support-SUSE-Cloud|accessdate=5 February 2013}} *[[Citrix Systems|Citrix]] {{cite web|title=Inktank Partners With Citrix to Support Ceph Distributed|url=http://www.bloomberg.com/article/2012-10-11/aREOgc3zVFfs.html|accessdate=5 February 2013}} *eNovance {{cite web|title=Storage for the grand French cloud? Inktank partners with eNovance on Ceph|url=http://gigaom.com/2013/01/30/storage-for-the-grand-french-cloud-inktank-partners-with-enovance-on-ceph/|accessdate=5 February 2013}} == References == {{Reflist}} [[Category:Companies established in 2011]] [[Category:Computer storage companies]]
